question: Which Indian Armed Force (IAF) has launched Operation Oliva to safeguard turtles in Odisha?
explanation: The Indian Coast Guard (ICG) recently launched an exercise \'Operation Oliva\' along the serene sea waters of Gahirmatha marine sanctuary in Odisha to protect the endangered Olive Ridley sea turtles during their mating season. The  exercise is part of its annual mission to ensure the safe mid-sea sojourn of breeding Olive Ridley sea turtles.
